sub_title: fundraiser | institutional donors | humanitarian aid | development cooperation
summary:
I am an open-minded, social and positive person. Passionate about contributing to a more just and inclusive world. My personal motto: “Either you win or you learn”. I have more than twenty years of experience in the International Cooperation sector. I am assertive, analytic, emphatic and result driven. I have perseverance to deliver quality, on time. I love to work with people from different cultures. 

I do: 

Storytelling. I develop clear stories about projects or social businesses that meet the customers’ demand. 

Project and (social) business case development. I have a hands-on mentality and a business mindset.

Fundraising for institutional donors (private foundations and trusts, government donors, NGOs, corporate foundations). I facilitate grant writing processes. I am a planner, organizer and like to connect with people. I do grant writing. I write clear and complete proposals for complex, international and multi-stakeholder projects. I am a good listener and able to make every partner's voice heard.

education.field_of_study: Human Geography and Urban and Regional Planning

profile_positions.title: Consultant International Cooperation

profile_positions.description:
I am an active member of FRIS. FRIS is a collective of around 20 freelancers in development cooperation and social business. Each member brings in his or her own expertise, experience and network. Together we can act more efficiently and effectively. 

We share knowledge and experiences, jointly develop tools, e.g. for proposal writing, jointly develop services, collaborate in assignments or tenders, and match clients with the best (team of) freelancers.
profile_positions.title: Co-creater within FRIS Collectief
Project Officer Social Business

profile_positions.description:
My focus area: Kenya, Tanzania, Thailand and Cambodia focusing on agribusiness, water, education and child protection. 

Main tasks and responsibilities:

- Fundraising Rotary Clubs  (presentations, support local events, proposal writing and reporting Rotary Foundation, contact Rotary Clubs). 

- Fundraising (International) Foundations (analyzing, acquisition, proposal writing and reporting).
profile_positions.title: Fundraising Officer

profile_positions.description:
My focus area: East and Southern Africa and Eastern Europe focusing on economic development, healthcare, water and sanitation, social care, children and development.  

 Main tasks and responsibilities:

- Fundraising Dutch companies (presentations, support local events, proposal writing and reporting
  funding opportunities, travelguide to project visits of company groups to Egypt and Sudan). 

- Fundraising Dutch youth groups (presentations, support local events, proposal writing and
  reporting funding opportunities, travelguide to project visits of youth groups to Tanzania). 

- Fundraising (International) Foundations (analyzing, acquisition, proposal writing and reporting).
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Trusts
